mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Herron, James A. to Anisansel, Henry
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Herron, James A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Col H Annisansel [Anisansel] Wheeling Aug 23d 1861. By Telegraph from Pittsburgh 1861. We are already sworn into US service but not attached to any regiment how will we have to proceed to join you we will muster a full company answer immediately J.A. Herron Captain J. K M Cavalry 30G75pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Herron, James A.
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Anisansel, Henry
